    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking box-destaque-assunto "><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/apos-susto-e-derrota-lebron-mostra-confianca-nos-cavs-podemos-virar.html"

                <p class="gui-text-headline"><strongnba</strong></p>
            
        

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/warriors-aceleram-no-fim-batem-os-grizzlies-e-vencem-setima-seguida.html" title="Warriors aceleram no fim, batem os Grizzlies e vencem a sétima seguida" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title" data-href="https://glo.bo/2n8mKhJ" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/LnD9krRIc6N_bmDMinuQ7F9yVws=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/26/2017-03-27t011414z_1483745548_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-memphis-grizzlies-at-golden-state-warriors.jpg">
            <h3 class="gui-text-title ">Warriors aceleram no fim, batem os Grizzlies e vencem a sétima seguida</h3>
        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    23:24 - 26/03/2017
                
            </p>
        

        <div class="share-bar plantao-share" data-theme="minimal" data-url="https://glo.bo/2n8mKhJ" data-title="Warriors aceleram no fim, batem os Grizzlies e vencem a sétima seguida" data-image-url="http://s2.glbimg.com/LnD9krRIc6N_bmDMinuQ7F9yVws=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/26/2017-03-27t011414z_1483745548_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-memphis-grizzlies-at-golden-state-warriors.jpg"></div>
    </div>
</div>

                <p class="gui-text-headline"><strongnba</strong></p>

        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    21:39 - 26/03/2017
                
            </p>

            <div class="glb-grid-2 large-2 column">

var SVCPesquisaConfig = {};
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

</div>
<div class="pre-main-content">
<div id="main" class="r7container-8  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite " data-browser-name="chrome">
<div>
</div>
<div id="content_scheme" class="r7container-7 content_scheme">
<div id="heading" class="r7cl7 ref-blog">
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="21">googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded',function(event){if((event.slot.getTargeting('pos')=="bg")){if(!event.isEmpty){r7adv.has_bg=true;}}});$(function(){postscribe('#r7-skyscraper-sidebar','<script>if ((r7adv.has_bg != true) && r7adv.allowSkyscraper()){ r7ad.printGAds([120, 600],"skyscraper"); }<\/script>');});</script>
<div class="r7-adv-skyscraper scrollable" id="r7-skyscraper-sidebar">
</div>
</div>
<div id="masthead">
<a href="javascript:void(0);" class="masthead-close" id="masthead-close">Fechar anúncio</a>
<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="22">r7ad.printGAds([970,250],'masthead').success(function(){'use strict';document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='block';$(document).ready(function(){document.getElementById('masthead-close').style.display='block';var hideCallback=function(){document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='none';};var onMastheadClose=function(e){e.preventDefault();$('#masthead').animate({height:0,opacity:0.4},500,hideCallback);};if($('.box.proximos_programas').length>0){$('.box.proximos_programas').addClass('masthead-true');}
$('.masthead-close').click(onMastheadClose);});});</script>
</div>
<div class="main-content">
<div class="row r7section-row ">
<div class="column r7cl5 ">

      <div class="image-holder">

          </figure>
        </a>

        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>

    </div>

      </div>
    </div>

    </div>
  </div>
</script>

<script id="articles-template" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
          {{#each articles}}            

            <li id="nativeads_position_{{@index}}" class="{{#not_empty cover_image_url}}nwl-has-img{{/not_empty}} nwl-row {{#if showDate}}new-date{{/if}}">     

              {{#if showDate}}
                <h6 class="nwl-date"> {{dateFormat first_published_at}} </h6>
              {{/if}}
              <div class="clearfix"></div>
              <div class="wrap-li">
                <span class="nwl-news-time">{{timeFormat first_published_at}}</span>

                {{#not_empty cover_image_url}}
                <span data-href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-wpr-cover box">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">                      
                      <div class="image-holder" style="position: relative">
                      <img alt="" class="article-video-icon-tag" style="{{#not_empty is_video}}display: block{{/not_empty}}" src="data:image/png;base64," />

                        <a href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                            <img class="nwl-cover-reference" src="{{treatment_image cover_image_url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" width="180" height="95" />
                        </a>
                            <div class="r7-shareit-bar no-text">
        <ul class="r7-shareit small">
          <li data-social-type="facebook" title="Compartilhe no Facebook" class="r7-icons r7-facebook shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="twitter" title="Compartilhe no Twitter" class="r7-icons r7-twitter shareit"></li>
          <li data-social-type="gPlus" title="Compartilhe no Google Plus" class="r7-icons r7-gPlus shareit"></li>

        </ul>
    </div>

                      </div>                      
                  </div>
                </span>
                {{/not_empty}}

                <div class="nwl-info">
                  <div class="r7-shareit-holder">
                    <p class="nwl-news-title">
                      <a href="{{section_url}}" class="nwl-section nw-link bullet content_scheme" target="{{is_r7_domain section_url}}">{{section_name}}</a>
                    </p>
                    <p class="nwl-news-title link-holder">
                      <a data-social-headline="{{section_name}}"  data-social-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-shorten="{{url}}" href="{{url}}" title="{{treatment_title title}}" class="nwl-link" target="{{is_r7_domain url}}">
                        {{treatment_title title}}
                      </a>
                      <img class="hidden" src="{{cover_image_url}}" />

                    <div class="r7-social-media-bar">
                      <ul class="r7-social-media mini" data-shorten="{{url}}" data-image="{{cover_image_url}}" data-lead="{{treatment_title title}}" data-headline="{{section_name}}">

                        </li>

</a>
<a class="r7item-image image thumb " href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/pop/fotos/no-rio-de-janeiro-octavia-spencer-participa-de-coletiva-de-imprensa-sobre-a-cabana-27032017?foto=5#!/foto/5">

</a>
</div>

        </a>
      </li>

<h5>Comunicar Erro</h5>
<form action="/r7/service/contactus/addContactUsSimple.jsp" onsubmit="validaCampos(this, event)" target="postcontactus" method="post" name="form_contactus">
<fieldset>
<div class="desc">Preencha os campos abaixo para informar o R7 sobre os erros encontrados nas nossas reportagens.</div>
<div id="msg-callback">
<div id="successMessage" class="sucesso">
<span class="iconOk"></span>
Mensagem enviada com Sucesso!
</div>
<div id="errorMessage">
<span class="iconAlert"></span>
Erro ao enviar mensagem, tente novamente!
</div>
</div>
<div class="campo">
<label for="report_name">*Seu nome: </label>
<input type="text" onblur="campoObrig(this)" onfocus="campoTextFoco(this)" title="até 120 caracteres" value="até 120 caracteres" maxlength="120" class="required text" id="report_name" name="nome"/>
<span></span>
</div>
<div class="campo">

<span></span>
</div>
<div class="campo">

<span></span>
</div>
